body_html:
Hi @anton-matosov ,

We have encountered problem when building TF with MKL on mac as is written in
bazelbuild/bazel#4794

After communications in the same page, it is recommended to try the newest bazel non - released, so we think about compiling bazel from source. This requires the installation of a released version, and problems still occur when installing the released bazel v 0.11.1 with a direct bash ./compile.sh .

Maybe you would be interested to try building bazel from source code on mac, and generously share with us a built binary?

Maybe you would be interested to try building bazel from source code on mac, and generously share with us a built binary?
body:
Hi @anton-matosov ,

We have encountered problem when building TF with MKL on mac as is written in 
https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/4794


After communications in the same page, it is recommended to try the newest bazel non -  released, so we think about compiling bazel from source. This requires the installation of a released version, and problems still occur when installing the released bazel v 0.11.1 with a direct `bash ./compile.sh` . 

Maybe you would be interested to try building bazel from source code on mac, and generously share with us a built binary?
